Vile Assembly.name: Vile Assembly
Vile Assembly.flavor: The dark forces are not about to let you die now, not when you are so close to achieving your ultimate purpose.
Vile Assembly.effect: You regain hit points equal to your healing surge value, and you are removed from play. At the start of your next turn, you return to play in an unoccupied space within 10 squares of the space you last occupied.

Victory at Any Price.name: Victory at Any Price
Victory at Any Price.flavor: You sacrifice an ally to ensure a swift and certain victory.
keywords:
Close burst 5

Trigger: You hit an enemy with an at-will or an encounter attack power.

Target: One ally in the burst who is not bloodied

Effect: The target takes damage equal to his or her bloodied value, and your hit becomes a critical hit.
Victory at Any Price.trigger: You hit an enemy with an at-will or an encounter attack power.
Victory at Any Price.target: One ally in the burst who is not bloodied
Victory at Any Price.effect: The target takes damage equal to his or her bloodied value, and your hit becomes a critical hit.
